com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.datasources

Class PhotoCacheDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.datasources.PhotoCacheDataSource

  • public class PhotoCacheDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    API that provide asynchronous methods: 1 - getPhotoCache that receive listener as a parameter and then get the image with her details from the internet and cache it, and then call one of the listener methods (onResult, onError, depends the situation) and run it on the caller thread - main thread. 2 - saveImageFile that receive listener as a parameter and write the image file on the storage, with the specified path, name, format and quality, and then call one of the listener method (onSaved, onAlreadySaved, onSavingFailed depends the situation) and run it on the main thread.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener
      To use saveImageFile(PhotoCache, String, int, OnImageFileSavedListener) saveImageFile} you must send a listener as a parameter so we can notify you with the results, in the one appropriate method from those methods: PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener.onSaved(PhotoCache) - when successfully saved, PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener.onAlreadySaved(PhotoCache) - when a file with same name already exist, PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener.onSavingFailed(IOException) - when an I/O error occurred.
      static interface  PhotoCacheDataSource.OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener
      To use getPhotoCache you must send a listener as a parameter so we can notify you with the results, in the appropriate method from those: PhotoCacheDataSource.OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener.onResult(PhotoCache), PhotoCacheDataSource.OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener.onError(Exception).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String ADDRESS_TEMPLATE
      Template for the website we connect to him to get the full photo info's
      private static java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService service
      Thread Pool with size 4, that do all the missions in the API

    • Method Detail

      • getFullPhotoSync

        private static FullPhoto getFullPhotoSync(java.lang.String photoId)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Method that connect to the internet link addresss and get the info from the HTML file and parse it to create FullPhoto object, and return it. This method work in sync way, way call her in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        photoId - is photo id that you want to get his info.
        Returns:
        a new FullPhoto object that contain all the info on the full res Photo.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it's fail to connect to the internet.

      • saveImageFileSync

        private static boolean saveImageFileSync(java.lang.String foldersPath,
                                         java.lang.String imageNameWithExtension,
                                         android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat format,
                                         android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                         int quality)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Method that write a Bitmap object to an image file in the storage, (external memory)
        Parameters:
        foldersPath - is a String that represent the path of the image file. Example: /storage/emulated/0/Pictures/MyWallHaven
        imageNameWithExtension - the name
        format - is the format of the image file you want to write - can be: JPEG, PNG, WEBP.
        bitmap - is the object that hold the image, can compress the image depends on the quality
        quality - int: Hint to the compressor, 0-100. 0 meaning compress for small size,quality 100 meaning compress for max quality. Some formats, like PNG which is lossless, will ignore the quality setting
        Returns:
        True if there NO file with the same name and succeed to create and write the file, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred

      • getPhotoCache

        public static void getPhotoCache(java.lang.String photoId,
                                 java.lang.String defaultPath,
                                 android.content.Context context,
                                 PhotoCacheDataSource.OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener listener)
        Async method that receive listener as a parameter and then get the image with her details from the internet and cache it, and then call one of the listener methods (onResult(PhotoCache), onError(Exception), depends the situation) and run it on the caller thread - main thread.
        Parameters:
        photoId - a String that represent the photo id that you want to get.
        defaultPath - is the default path of the saving images, it's necessary to check at runtime if the image already downloaded and saved in a matter to show the appropriate icon and string. Example: /storage/emulated/0/Pictures/MyWallHaven
        context - Any context, will not be retained.
        listener - is a listener that implement OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener Interface to notify him when the the result is ready in : PhotoCacheDataSource.OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener.onResult(PhotoCache) method. or an error accrued dairying the process in: PhotoCacheDataSource.OnPhotoCacheArrivedListener.onError(Exception) method. Notice those methods (onResult,onError) runs on the caller thread.

      • saveImageFile

        public static void saveImageFile(PhotoCache photoCache,
                                 java.lang.String foldersPath,
                                 int quality,
                                 PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener listener)
        Async method that receive listener as a parameter and write the image file on the storage, with the specified path, name, format and quality, and then call one of the listener method (onSaved(PhotoCache), onAlreadySaved(PhotoCache), onSavingFailed(IOException) depends on the situation) and run it on the caller thread - main thread.
        Parameters:
        photoCache - is an instance that contain the image cache (as a Bitmap and Drawable), name(id) and format so we use it to write the image file.
        foldersPath - is the path of the folders you want to save the image file in it. Example: /storage/emulated/0/Pictures/MyWallHaven
        quality - int: Hint to the compressor, 0-100. 0 meaning compress for small size,quality 100 meaning compress for max quality. Some formats, like PNG which is lossless, will ignore the quality setting
        listener - is a listener that implement OnImageFileSavedListener Interface to notify him when the file successfully saved in : PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener.onSaved(PhotoCache) method. or when the file already exist in foldersPath in : PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener.onAlreadySaved(PhotoCache) method. or an error accrued dairying the process in: PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener.onSavingFailed(IOException) method. Notice those methods (onSaved, onAlreadySaved, onSavingFailed) runs on the caller thread.
